Package simulator.framework.faults

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DoorMotorBlackoutFault
    Black out the network for a certain period of time after the door motors start.
    FailedButtonFault
    This fault model implements a fail-silent button failure.
    Fault
    Utility superclass for fault objects.
    FaultPayloadFault
    Creates and injects a fault payload on the physical network
    FaultUtility
    static utility methods for faults
    NetworkFault
    Registers network faults like bit error rate and drop messages.
    SpecificMessageFault
    Supress a particular network or framework message
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FailedButtonFault.ButtonFaultType
    Constants used to specify car or hall button faults.
    NetworkFault.NetworkFaultType
